## House Rules

- Be respectful; critique ideas, not people.
- Celebrate first-time contributors.
- Share sources when dropping knowledge.
- Flag moderators `{@handles}` if the convo needs steering.

## Icebreakers

- Newcomers: “What brought you here and what’s one thing you’d love to learn?”
- Seasoned contributors: “What issue, doc, or ritual should newcomers check out first?”
